title: VP8 Encoder Ported
author: Amanpreet (Porting Flumotion)
content:
I worked on porting the VP8 Encoder today. There were not many changes required, just that a few properties were removed and othersâ€™ names were changed.

After porting was complete, I was able to watch a videotest stream encoded with VP8 encoder. Tomorrow I will be porting other encoders.

Originally posted on Porting Flumotion - GSoC '14 Progress Blog
